items.name: Tadkewale Dahi Paneer
items.description: A vegetarian dish made with cubes of paneer simmered in a creamy yogurt (dahi) and melon seed paste sauce and spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Meat Beliram
items.description: A mouth-watering delicacy of the Punjabi cuisine created by chef Beliram. The lamb is cooked with yoghurt, ghee, ginger, garlic, onion, and a melange of whole and ground spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Aloo Tikki Wrap
items.description: Boiled potatoes mixed with spices, chillies, mint and corriander, pan fried into a crispy patty and wrapped in whole wheat flatbread with pickled onions and chaat masala. Served with a side of spicy green chutney.

items.name: Chole Chawal
items.description: A popular North Indian dish featuring spicy and tangy chickpea curry (chole) served with basmati rice (chawal). This classic combination offers a hearty and satisfying meal, with the robust flavors of the chickpea curry complementing the fluffy rice.

items.name: Mambazham Pulissery
items.description: A delightful Kerala dish made with ripe mangoes, creamy yogurt, and fresh coconut tempered with mustard seeds, curry leaves and dried red chilli. This sweet and tangy curry is a perfect balance of flavors
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Prawns Moliee
items.description: A delicious and flavorful curry dish originating from Kerala, India. It features succulent prawns cooked in a creamy coconut milk sauce bursting with aromatic spices. The depth of flavor is achieved with ingredients like ginger, garlic, curry leaves, and chilies.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Vazhakkai Bajji
items.description: A savory Indian snack made with plantains coated in a batter made with a mixture of rice and chickpea flour, flavoured with some spices and deep-fried until golden and crispy.

items.name: Idipayam and Ishtu
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish consisting of steamed rice noodles, known as idiyappam, served with a flavorful and creamy coconut milk-based vegetable stew, called ishtu.

items.name: Bati Basa
items.description: A delicacy from the state of Orissa. Oyester mushrooms cooked with onion, ginger, garlic and a flavourful Besara paste that makes this dish absloutely flavourful.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Besara
items.description: A delectable Odia dish where succulent chicken pieces are cooked in a tangy mustard paste gravy, offering a unique and flavorful twist to traditional chicken recipes. It's a tantalizing fusion of spice and tang.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Sweet Potato Chaat
items.description: Boiled sweet potato mixed with variey of chutneys and spices topped with fresh corriander and pomagrante

items.name: Vagharela Bhaat
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish from the state of Gujarat in India.

items.name: Kerala Veg Thali
items.description: A vibrant array of vegetarian dishes from Kerala in one meal! Featuring some authentic & classic dishes: avial, sambar, cabbage thoran & cucumber pachadi accompanied by fluffy rice, crispy papadum and pickle. This thali embodies the diverse and delicious vegetarian cuisine of Kerala.

items.name: Kerala Non-Veg Thali
items.description: A tantalizing assortment of non-vegetarian dishes from Kerala: chicken fry, prawns masala, chicken stew and cucumber pachadi accompanied by fluffy rice, crispy papadam and pickle. Bursting with the flavors from coconut, curry leaves, and a medley of spices, each dish offers a unique culinary experience rooted in Kerala's coastal and inland traditions.

items.name: Chicken Ishtu
items.description: A Kerala-style stew featuring tender chicken pieces simmered in a creamy coconut milk gravy, infused with aromatic spices and vegetables for a comforting and flavorful dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad

items.name: Veg Stir Fry Noodles with Gravy
items.description: A delicious Indo-Chinese inspired dish. Stir fried noodles with assorted vegetables in chinese sauses served with a gravy made with Indo-Chinese flavors and vegetables. A perfect combination of mouthwatering flavors and textures to satisfy your cravings.

items.name: Chicken Stir Fry Noodles with Gravy
items.description: A delicious Indo-Chinese inspired dish. Stir fried noodles with assorted vegetables and chicken pieces in chinese sauses served with a gravy made with Indo-Chinese flavors, vegetables and chicken pieces. A perfect combination of mouthwatering flavors and textures to satisfy your cravings.

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy deep fried noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Mushroom Fried Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese style fried rice dish made with cooked rice, sautéed with mushrooms, vegetables and a blend of sauces and seasonings.

items.name: Dal Bhukara
items.description: A rich and creamy North Indian dish made from black lentils (urad dal) cooked with tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, and aromatic spices until thick and creamy. Slow-cooked to perfection, this velvety dal is often finished with a dollop of butter and cream.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Seekh Rara
items.description: A flavorful dish made with minced chicken marinated in spices and yogurt, then grilled or skewered and cooked in a rich tomato and onion gravy. It's a popular dish in Mughlai cuisine, known for its aromatic and slightly smoky taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Dahi Vada
items.description: Lentil balls deep fried and smeared with spiced yogurt, tamarind chutney and spicy green chutney topped with chaat masala, pomogranate seeds and coriander

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Hyderabadi Khatti Meethi Dal
items.description: A tangy and sweet lentil dish originating from the culinary traditions of Hyderabad, India. It features a combination of lentils such as toor dal (pigeon peas) or chana dal (split chickpeas), cooked with tamarind pulp, jaggery or sugar, and a blend of spices like cumin, mustard seeds, and red chilies. The result is a flavorful and balanced dal with a perfect harmony of sour and sweet notes
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Hyderabadi Chicken Pasanday
items.description: A delectable curry originating from the Hyderabadi cuisine of India. It features tender chicken pieces cooked in a rich and flavorful gravy made with a symphony of spices, nuts, and yogurt. The unique blend of ingredients creates a dish that is both aromatic and flavorful, with a delightful balance of creaminess and tang.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Rajma Galouti Kebab
items.description: A melt-in-your-mouth vegetarian kebab made with red kidney beans (rajma) instead of meat. It's a delicious variation on the traditional Galouti Kebab, which typically uses minced lamb. The rajma is cooked and mashed, then mixed with a variety of spices and other ingredients to create a flavorful and tender kebab mixture. The kebabs are then shallow-fried until golden brown. (4 kebabs)

items.name: Mumbai Style Kheema Pav
items.description: A popular street food dish from Mumbai. It features spiced minced chicken cooked with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices. Served with 2 pav

items.name: Dhokar Dhalna
items.description: A traditional Bengali dish made from spiced lentil cakes (dhoka) cooked in a flavorful gravy (dalna). The lentil cakes are made from ground chana dal (split Bengal gram) mixed with spices like cumin, turmeric, and chili powder, then shaped into small squares and fried until golden brown. These fried lentil cakes are then simmered in a tomato-based gravy
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Lamb Razela
items.description: A mouthwatering curry originating from Bengal, India. It features succulent pieces of lamb cooked in a rich and creamy gravy made with yogurt, cashews, poppy seeds, and a warm blend of spices. The result is a dish that is both flavorful and aromatic, with a delightful balance of richness and creaminess.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Aloo Kheema Cutlet
items.description: A savory Indian snack made with mashed potatoes stuffed with a spiced minced meat filling, then coated and fried until crispy. It's a delicious combination of textures and flavors (4 cutlets)

items.name: Kichuri
items.description: A flavorful dish made with rice, lentils, mixed vegetables, and aromatic spices.

items.name: Paneer Makhni Biryani
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a thick creamy buttery gravy of onion, tomato, cashew, ginger and garlic and then layered with aromatic basmati rice, caramalised onion, coriander, mint and slow cooked. Served with a side of yogurt dip + papad

items.name: Butter Chicken Biryani
items.description: A delicious fusion dish that combines the flavors of butter chicken and biryani. It features tender pieces of chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce, layered with fragrant, spiced rice, and slow-cooked to perfection, resulting in a rich and flavorful one-pot meal. served with raita + papad

items.name: Green Dhokla
items.description: A vibrant vegetarian and vegan snack originating from Gujarat, India. It's made with a fermented batter of rice and lentils, steamed into fluffy squares and seasoned with chilies for a delightful savory and slightly sour taste. (4 dhoklas)

items.name: Moong Dal Idli
items.description: Nutritious and fluffy South Indian breakfast dish made by fermenting a batter of  moong dal and rice, seasoned with spices like cumin seeds, ginger, and green chilies, then steamed into soft and pillowy cakes. served with coconut chutney. Place the order latest by morning the day before to allow preparation of the batter. (4 idlis)

items.name: Veg Chilli Garlic Noodles
items.description: Delicious and spicy Asian-inspired dish featuring stir-fried noodles, mixed vegetables, and a tantalizing chili garlic sauce, creating a perfect balance of flavors and textures.

items.name: Chicken Chilli Garlic Noodles
items.description: A delectable Indo-Chinese dish featuring stir-fried noodles, succulent chicken pieces, and a delightful combination of garlic and chili, offering a perfect balance of savory and spicy flavors.

items.name: Crispy Veg Manchurian
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese appetizer made with a variety of colorful vegetables coated in batter and deep fried for a crisp texture. These are then then tossed in a flavourful sauce to make a perfect snack. (4 pieces)

items.name: Masala Bhaat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato, and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander
